settings.heroImageAlt: Several products and there correct prediction probability from the AI
settings.introductionText: You can now use the image keyword assistant that uses artificial intelligence to analyze and add relevant tags to your uploaded images. The assistant enables you to use natural search terms to find images easier.
settings.labelAddKeywordsToImageAltText: Add keywords to image alt text
settings.footnote: The image keyword assistant will process uploaded images in the background and may take some time to finish.

media-quickinfo.infoText: Image keyword assistant is processing this image, this may take some time to finish.
